          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Light absorption and reflection of objects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtabsorption und Reflexion der Nachrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Absorption de la lumière et réflexion des 
objets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Absorption claro e reflexão dos objetos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assorbimento della luce e riflessione degli 
oggetti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά απορρόφηση και αντανάκλαση των αντικειμένων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Absorción ligera y reflexión de objetos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that white and pale things reflect light while black things absorb light.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">black objects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pale objects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">white objects</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß weiße und 
Lattensachen helles reflektieren, während schwarze Sachen Licht 
aufsaugen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les choses blanches
et pâles réfléchissent léger tandis que les choses noires 
absorbent la lumière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as coisas brancas e 
pálidas refletem claro quando as coisas pretas absorverem a luz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che le cose bianche e
pallide riflettono chiaro mentre le cose nere assorbono la luce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα άσπρα και χλωμά 
πράγματα απεικονίζουν το φως ενώ τα μαύρα πράγματα απορροφούν το
φως.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las cosas blancas y
pálidas reflejan ligero mientras que las cosas negras absorben la 
luz.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schwarze Nachrichten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lattennachrichten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
